ai-anya-e0105n32:1_0: After putting on a doubt of the Pātimokkha, a teacher of the recitation of the Monastic Code, on a teacher, a hard worker, and on the road, the senior monks from the group of six, a teacher, a pupil of the Great Sīhahaniya, the Lion, and one by one, the Sambuddha who stands in the value of the Sīhahanañjikāputta. He, the monastery on the road topic of Āḷa. The Great Sīha, the Great Sīhahaniyans, the Master Mahāthūpa, and created a roof-cover, that arose in the monastery.
ai-anya-e0105n32:1_1: Therefore it was said: “Next, Tissa, this is the eighth talk”
ai-anya-e0105n32:2_0: “For he who is delivered with water, ~ pure,
ai-anya-e0105n32:3_0: Suppiya because of his conduct, begged the Elder Nuns’ son,
ai-anya-e0105n32:4_0: There he praised the mendicants in that place.
ai-anya-e0105n32:6_0: The residents of the Mahāvihāra monastery
ai-anya-e0105n32:7_0: I will lay down the golden drum with doubts, without doubting or any doubt.”
ai-anya-e0105n32:9_0: The residents of the Mahāvihāra monastery
ai-anya-e0105n32:10_0: This is a conclusion about this matter.
ai-anya-e0105n32:11_0: all the times in the composal.
ai-anya-e0105n32:12_0: For there is no footing in the thunder,
ai-anya-e0105n32:13_0: Discussions of the Great Monasterys, the capital of the Mahāthūpa and of the Commentaries.”
